page.title: 03RECREATION
page.content: This area of the rural-urban fringe of {IPSWICH} is rich in sporting facilities. The {Northgate} Sports Centre contains a floodlit international athletics track, tennis, squash and badminton courts and even a floodlit 'PETANQUE' area. It is part of Ipswich Borough Council's Recreation and Amenities Department and is heavily used by people of Ipswich. Other important sports facilities include rugby clubs, large Ipswich companies' sports grounds and other open spaces for football and cricket. Much of this sporting land was until recently farmalnd but with the increase in leisure time, more of this land on the fringes of the town is being turned to recreational use.
